This demo serves as a visual test for:

  1. Tile blending in the presence of transparency.
  2. Falling back to child and parent tiles when the desired tile is unavailable.
  3. Queuing up textures to be loaded once the Flash renderer has been initialized.

The rendered image should appear after a while and match the expected image.

To change the stage type under test, select a dropdown entry and click Reload.
